name: Royal Baby Run! Keep Calm and Carry On RUNNING!
name_original: Royal Baby Run! Keep Calm and Carry On RUNNING!
description:
*** FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME! ***

The much beloved Royal Family of the United Kingdom is welcoming a new member! Baby George! And it's time to take the Royal Baby for a walk!

or... a RUN!

See the game in action here: http://youtu.be/uD6LhRs5mAU

Select your Royal and RUN as far as you can!
Jump over, or slide under obstacles!
Collect pound coins to unlock new characters!

KEEP CALM AND CARRY ON RUNNING!!

With addictively simple gameplay, hilarious graphics and animations, and a rockin' royal soundtrack, Royal Run is bound to bring a smile to your face!

(This game is a silly piece of digital memorabilia and is meant as a tribute to our beloved monarchy. It is NOT endorsed by the Royal Family in any way.)
